name: Zombye-bye
description:
Don't let the humans die from the Zombies. Give them a Goodbye bye allowing them to run into the Spikes. So, let the zombie dies! 

-How to play

Arrow Keys- for moving the Platforms

Numpad1 - Start the game and Continue past Screens

Numbpad2 - Reset the Room

Numbpad3 - close the game
